text: ya 'ahl alktab, sddiqu waemaluu bima nzzalna min alqran, msdqana lima maeakum min alkutub min qabl 'an nakhdhkm bisu' snyekm, fnmhw alwujuh wnhwlha qibal alzhwr, 'aw nlen hwla' almufsidin bmskhhm qiradatan wkhnazyr, kama lenna alyhwd min 'ashab alsbt, aladhin nuhu ean alsayd fih falam ynthu, fghdb allah elyhm, wtrdhm min rhmth, wakan 'amr allah nafdhana fi kl hal
